<gco:CharacterString>This polyline data set contains the locations of oil and gas pipelines in the Gulf of Mexico Outer Continental Shelf federal waters that are associated with the oil and gas industry\ufffd\ufffd€™s pipeline infrastructure. Note: Pipelines are being added or modified continuously; obtaining updates of this data are required to know the true distribution of pipeline data.Because GIS projection and topology functions can change or generalize coordinates, these GIS files are considered to be approximate and are NOT an OFFICIAL record. Contains the pipeline arcs as of December 2014. Used ArcCatalog to create shape files.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:abstract>          <gmd:purpose>             <gco:CharacterString>To show the pipelines located in the federal waters of the Gulf of Mexico OCS Region for reference in maps showing coastal features; data is updated and posted on the website on a monthly basis, typically on the first of each month. This is the pipelines from TIMS GOM as of December 2014</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:purpose>          <gmd:credit>             <gco:CharacterString>Originally created by Chief Mapping and
